title: “Sick and Twisted”: Women Sue Texas Over Harrowing Medical Episodes Caused by Abortion Bans
description:
The first-of-its-kind lawsuit seeks to affirm that doctors can use their best medical judgment without fear of criminal penalty.

The post “Sick and Twisted”: Women Sue Texas Over Harrowing Medical Episodes Caused by Abortion Bans appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Matt Gaetz, Progressive Caucus, and Former Obama Ambassador Team Up to Oppose Syria Occupation
description:
Robert Ford, who as ambassador to Syria pushed an aggressive approach to Bashar al-Assad's regime, is now backing a resolution by Gaetz to end the remaining U.S. occupation.

The post Matt Gaetz, Progressive Caucus, and Former Obama Ambassador Team Up to Oppose Syria Occupation appeared first on The Intercept.
